charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_0400_:
but right now, Pidgeot and I are busy taking
on sync pairs from Kanto and Johto!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_0500_: Battling me’s part of that, apparently.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_0700_: Pidgeot’s been my Pokémon since Kanto.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_0800_:
I don’t wanna forget my roots, so I’ve been
going around battling everyone from Kanto.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_0900_:
But now, guys like Ethan and Silver have
also awakened their arc suits and are
getting stronger.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1000_: And I can’t lose to my protégés!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1100_:
So I’m having folks from Johto who helped
whip them into shape battle me, too!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1200_:
It seems you and your partner have
accomplished a lot together, staying
by each other’s side all this time.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1300_: Yeah. He’s always been there for me.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1400_:
He’s my go-to for testing a new opponent’s
strength.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1500_:
And sometimes I even keep him for last,
as my ace in the hole!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1600_:
But because I send him out first so often,
Red caught on and started countering with
his Pikachu.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_1700_:
I hate to admit it, but that IS the perfect way
to counter bird Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_0301_1800_:
Maybe there’s a way around the type
disadvantage.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_0401_1900_:
True—there are ways to overcome your
weaknesses.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_0401_2000_:
Maybe you can give Electric-type Pokémon
a shock of their own!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_0302_2100_:
What if you turned the tables in your
favor?
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_0402_2200_:
Makes sense. I bet I could catch them off
guard if I used a move effective against
Pikachu.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_0402_2300_:
I’m gonna think up a strategy that’ll make
Red sweat!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_2400_:
Of all my Pokémon, Pidgeot in particular has
gone up against tons of strong opponents.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_2500_:
No matter how tough the battle, he’ll find a
way to break through!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_2600_: You have a good relationship with him.
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_2700_:
You two getting your arc suit has been
inspiring for me, too!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_2800_:
You’ve given us bird Pokémon sync pairs
hope!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_2900_:
We’re just getting started! We still have
room to soar even higher!
charaepi_ch0021_91_green/2301_1201_3000_:
Pidgeot and I will keep flying ahead of the
Pasio pack!
